attributes.action: Remove two phone boxes from Castle Road Chatham Kent
attributes.additional_details: As nobody uses the phone boxes now a days, there has been number of hoax calls from the phone boxes (using our address as one), drug dealers use them to score in and there has been needles left there too.
attributes.background: Remove two phone boxes from Castle Road Chatham Kent ME4 5LN

rejection.details: This is a matter for your local council. You can find out how to contact your local council here: https://www.gov.uk/find-local-council
